I wish I could recommend this game to new players, but until the Devs start acting like they care, and stop taking their community for granted this game will not last much longer. The game is imbalanced, has multiple bugs with every update, you need to redownload the game after every update due to how the devs designed the game. The only new content they release are killers/survivors. No new game modes, barely any new maps, and never any quality of life updates that the community has been asking for for years. 

The devs just do not care, and with other better alternatives being available soon (VHS, Outlast Trials, Midnight Ghost Hunt and the Evil Dead game) it's just not worth the time or effort for new players right now.

dobra gra ale ma trochÄ™ bÅ‚Ä™dÃ³w do naprawienia <3
The boner I got from watching Dwight get double teamed by Myers and The Trapper does not justify the amount of brain cells lost to this game.

This game is addicting I won't lie about that. But it's very confusing and honestly every match is a gamble because there's so many perks it makes it incredibly difficult to do almost anything. The devs baby the killers and make them VERY overpowered in so many different ways, for example spend $5 to buy a killer like leatherface or grind roughly 4 days worth of playtime to unlock him and all you need to do is spam his alternative attack and it's a 1 shot. They give almost no punishment at all for missing attacks or getting stunned so spamming is very encouraged. Hooks are all over the place unless you have a high level survivor and role the dice on getting an offering to decrease the amount of hooks spawning. Killers may be very annoying, but survivors can play cheap as it's the only way to counter almost any killer at all. map design is ATROCIOUS, there's either too many pallets or almost none at all with it usually being either indoors and VERY close quarters or outside and 80% of the map is just grass and dirt with the edges of the map being random structures that make no sense being there at all. The Graphics and hitboxes are very outdated, I guess it's more of a personal opinion, but I think the 4/10 level graphics take away from the horror aspect of the game a little bit. The hitboxes make no sense, not really sure how a kitchen knife has a roughly 4 feet long reach it's kinda weird. As for the game overall it`s a 4/10 the devs as far as I know aren't very friendly to the community, and the community itself is very toxic and they have no shame in the way they play which is usually pretty scummy. This game has a few good qualities it's an interesting concept for sure but this dev team has no idea what they're doing and they have made it very clear they don't plan on improving it much or updating the way it looks or taking different approaches to make it fresh again. buy it if it's on sale, but you most likely won't keep it very long
This game is amazing a bit scary but my favorite game of all time 10/10 rec
If your trying to start this game now I suggest not to because the skill based match making is trash and you will only get matched with max leveled killers.

This game have great potential, it's fun , have great mechanics , enjoyable sometimes but it's complete BS , it's one sided , killer sided , too easy to win as killer , perks are broken , you could just camp survivors you hook and you win , and yet the devs and the head game designer don't care , "why can't you survive while doing all the survivor tasks?" 
That's why i don't recommend this game , the devs don't listen or care about their game , gameplay , meta , they are paid to do BS and say BS to their game.

Sad it's dying , but they are aware of it.

this game is ass. bad netcode, unbalanced mess. this game makes you feel annoyed rather than scared. literally 40 of my hours are waiting in a fucking queue. +bugs +unpolished mfs will still spend money on this game for stupid ass dlc because no other game dev has made anything comparable in this genre
Just check recent patch notes, R.I.P dbd is all i have to say.

If you like objective horror/slasher games dbd is the way to go. Great variety of licensed and original killers and survivors to choose from; With even more perks to build your character of choice. Once you get past the I'm scared of the killer part you'll have fun.

DBD is a great game to play with your friends. You can coordinate perk builds in your party with your friends and the whole aesthetic and vibe of dbd is very different from any game. Despite the gory features like slapping people with a machete and impaling people with a meat hook, there isn't a lot of blood and guts. Sure the screen gets a little bloody, but if you're into intense violence and gut-wrenching blood spewing this game isn't it. Killer is fun to play until you get into a certain skill level where survivors run the same perks that pretty much force you to chase a different survivor once you down and hook one. This doesn't sound that bad, but hooking each survivor one by one is the least effective way to win because 3 other survivors are constantly going to be repairing generators. If you follow this cute little nice guy play style, you will awlays get 0 kills. You'll be wondering 'But I hooked them so many times, didn't I??'. Yes, you did. But unfortunately the more experience you have of the game, the more times survivors will use the meta perks that force you to chase different survivors. The other side will just bring the strongest perks, items and killers. Fortunately, there are some people that like to use a lot of variety and have fun using exotic and underrated perks. It just sucks that barely anyone does this and people just constantly use the strongest shit. The game is really fun as long as you use unique killers, perks and items. I highly recommend taking breaks from dbd every so often because the game will start to feel rage inducing after a while. Aside from the abuse of meta, dbd has a lot of potential to be a fun game, more so if these meta things get nerfed.
bem divertido mas se prepare para passar raiva!
unfair and not balanced all killers do is camp and all survivers do is anything they can to aggravate the killed until they quit im starting to regret buying it

I would say this game is fun, but really that is objective. If you're looking for a chase or to be chased you found the right thrill. I wont say its super fun right off bat but with time an growth in skill you'll grow really found of playing with the Killer when you're a survivor. I will let you know that their are players out their who like to use perks to play solo. Its annoying to try to work as a team when their is some always leading the Killer to people working on Jenny's. Other then your regular share of O.P. Killers I enjoy this game an I will say its work a buy.
I don't know I think they did a pretty good job so far.

Tiene MUCHO potencial de ser un juego divertido, chill, creativo en cuanto a las builds que podÃ©s armar... lamentablemente, ocurre TODO LO CONTRARIO, por lo siguiente:

SI JUGÃS KILLER:

-El meta actual para survivors es excesivamente tÃ³xico, roto y anula cualquier mÃ­nimo de diversiÃ³n. Una vez que alcanzÃ¡s un rank relativamente alto, te vas a encontrar con que el 90% de los players usan una build meta que rompe el juego. De los 104 (CIENTOCUATRO) perks, son los ÃšNICOS 5 o 6 perks que se usan.

Â¿QuÃ© logra esto? Que la partida se convierta para vos en una maratÃ³n eterna, estÃºpida y frustrante en donde le pegÃ¡s a un survi y en segundos ya tenÃ©s a los otros survis (muy probablemente en comms) haciendote bodyblock, toxiqueandote, te flashean, te loopean infinitamente por loops increÃ­blemente broken, se curan en segundos, y asÃ­ eternamente. Â¿Estuviste maso 1 minuto persiguiendo al mismo survi? Cagaste, ya te hicieron 2 o 3 gens y listo, la partida estÃ¡ perdida y no hay NADA que puedas hacer.

Si jugÃ¡s killer, creÃ©me que 8 de 10 partidas te van a salir asÃ­. Altamente predecibles, repetitivas, nada original, repeat repeat repeat hasta que te des cuenta que no importa quÃ© killer uses, solamente podÃ©s elegir entre los que pueden hacer poco y los que pueden hacer nada frente a este meta. Un asco y aburridÃ­simo.

Â¿Ah pero si por este motivo hacÃ©s un mÃ­nimo de camping o te quedÃ¡s 1 metro mÃ¡s cerca del hook ya que no te queda otra? Te putean y toxiquean en el post-game.

SI JUGÃS SURVIVOR:

-Â¿Te toca un buen team en comms con el meta anterior? Genial, muy probablemente tenÃ©s asegurada la partida. Eso si les interesa ayudarte, porque lo mismo te pueden dejar en pelotas y muriÃ©ndote desde el primer hook ya que les importa mÃ¡s boludear al killer y hacer sus pro-moves que aprendieron de algÃºn streamer pre-homÃ­nido.
Â¿Pero cuÃ¡l es la gracia de que todos tus compas usen el mismo meta de perks, de que ya sabÃ©s lo que va a suceder?

REPITO: este juego era muy divertido anteriormente. Pero la han cagado muchÃ­simo con perks que le dan DEMASIADO power a los survis.

Play DBD with the intention to have fun not to rank up or take the game very seriously. As the more you take it seriously the more frustration you will have of this game!

Also few things to know Killers do tunnel in this game and can be aggressive just have to deal with it and not get too angry about it.

The game has horrible ultra wide support. Everything feels zoomed in. Even after you change enable the Ultra Wide setting it gives you black borders around your screen and even then it still a bit zoomed in.

Fun but you have to play as a survivor  with friends to make the real fun happen. :)

You can also play alone but then i recommend you playing as the killer wich is very fun aswell but harder then surviver.
